pullrequest.title: Suppress cpplint warning about whitespace with function pointers

content.raw:
See the white space removals here: [#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-common/pull-requests/135/more-codecheck-fixes/diff](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-common/pull-requests/135/more-codecheck-fixes/diff)

Statements like: `std::function<void (int)> myFunc` would trigger the error, where the space between `void` and the opening paren would be the “error”.
content.html:
See the white space removals here: #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-common/pull-requests/135/more-codecheck-fixes/diff

Statements like: std::function<void (int)> myFunc would trigger the error, where the space between void and the opening paren would be the “error”.

content.raw:
I tried this branch with ign-common and I still get these:

~~~
/mnt/TERA/code/ign-common/events/src/Event_TEST.cc:29:  Extra space before ( in function call  [whitespace/parens] [4]
/mnt/TERA/code/ign-common/events/src/Event_TEST.cc:73:  Extra space before ( in function call  [whitespace/parens] [4]
/mnt/TERA/code/ign-common/events/src/Event_TEST.cc:85:  Extra space before ( in function call  [whitespace/parens] [4]
/mnt/TERA/code/ign-common/events/src/Event_TEST.cc:98:  Extra space before ( in function call  [whitespace/parens] [4]
/mnt/TERA/code/ign-common/events/src/Event_TEST.cc:112:  Extra space before ( in function call  [whitespace/parens] [4]
/mnt/TERA/code/ign-common/events/src/Event_TEST.cc:128:  Extra space before ( in function call  [whitespace/parens] [4]
/mnt/TERA/code/ign-common/events/src/Event_TEST.cc:144:  Extra space before ( in function call  [whitespace/parens] [4]
/mnt/TERA/code/ign-common/events/src/Event_TEST.cc:161:  Extra space before ( in function call  [whitespace/parens] [4]
/mnt/TERA/code/ign-common/events/src/Event_TEST.cc:179:  Extra space before ( in function call  [whitespace/parens] [4]
~~~

I removed the whole build folders and started from scratch, am I doing anything wrong?

pullrequest.title: Suppress cpplint warning about whitespace with function pointers

content.raw: Ok, nevermind, I was using `ign-common`'s `gz11` branch, which uses `ign-cmake1` instead of the `bionic` branch. Still catching up with all the branches.
content.html: Ok, nevermind, I was using ign-common's gz11 branch, which uses ign-cmake1 instead of the bionic branch. Still catching up with all the branches.

pullrequest.title: Suppress cpplint warning about whitespace with function pointers

content.raw: If you’ve already started working on this or feel strongly about this, then by all means continue. However, perfecting this particular change is not very important. Some style checks are important, such as checks that can help avoid runtime errors, and some style checks are not as important, such as whitespace checks. Just trying to help prioritize work.
content.html: If you’ve already started working on this or feel strongly about this, then by all means continue. However, perfecting this particular change is not very important. Some style checks are important, such as checks that can help avoid runtime errors, and some style checks are not as important, such as whitespace checks. Just trying to help prioritize work.

pullrequest.title: Suppress cpplint warning about whitespace with function pointers

content.html:
What I meant to say is that the regex is too broad. For example, the following would have been flagged before this pull request but is now ignored:

diff -r 1b993a7f6d0d src/SystemPaths_TEST.cc
--- a/src/SystemPaths_TEST.cc   Tue Jun 12 19:20:17 2018 -0700
+++ b/src/SystemPaths_TEST.cc   Thu Jun 14 09:09:31 2018 -0700
@@ -41,7 +41,7 @@
       if (getenv("IGN_PLUGIN_PATH"))
         this->backupPluginPath += getenv("IGN_PLUGIN_PATH");

-      putenv(const_cast<char*>("IGN_PLUGIN_PATH="));
+      putenv (const_cast<char*>("IGN_PLUGIN_PATH="));
     }

   public: virtual void TearDown()

It's not a huge deal, but I wanted to point it out
